channel.title: Chain Chant (Album) - Vibrato
channel.description:
My new album made with the free version of Auxy Pro: Chain Chant!
Songs: 1. Howling Sun 2. Skies of Winter 3. Juice 4. Trek 5. Shreds 6. In A Rush 7. Burst 8. Visible Electricity
Link: https://soundcloud.com/vibrato-tunes/sets/chain-chant
Tell me which one was your favorite!

item.title: Chain Chant (Album) - Vibrato
item.dc:creator: Vibrato
item.description:
Thank you!
The main concept originally started as weather/seasons, etc., then I recycled some old abandoned projects, improved and added them. Visible electricity was made when I recorded my voice singing the main theme, then expanded it with Auxy
